column2: "Ahaha, ahahahaha! It's a real fairy, amazing! I've only ever seen them in books before!"
"Hey, hey, how are you flying? What lets you fly?"
"Ah, wai-...Don't pull on my wings! Ow, ow that hurts! I said that hurts!"
"Ohh... <%me>, save me!"
"Please stop bullying her."
"Xiera gets scary when she's mad."
"I haven't been bullying her at all! Miss Fairy looks so happy!"
"I'm not happy at all! Haven't you heard me shouting in pain? Jeez..."
"Angry fairies are scary? Does she grow really big or something? Will she try to eat me?"
"I'm not scary, I don't grow at all, and I most certainly don't want to eat anyone!"
"Hehehe, Flo's been playing all day and yet he still has so much energy left."
"Big sis?"
"Ah! W-what's the matter, Flo?"
"Why does big sis look so upset?"
"This is a really really nice place, isn't it? It's a pretty and relaxing and really fun place, isn't it?"
"We should play, laugh, and have fun! Isn't that why we came here? Why waste it being upset?"
"I have... many things to think about."
"Things to think about? Are they happy things? Are they fun things?"
"Ah, not quite... I'm thinking about the future, I suppose."
"How mysterious..."
"Hm? Might I ask what you mean?"
"You don't know how the future's going to turn out, right? So why would it make you sad? Why would it hurt to think about?"
"If it makes you sad, why not stop? If it's painful, why not give up on it instead?"
"I... cannot do that. Even if it is painful or difficult, I cannot abandon my duty."
"If I were to do such a thing, I would be betraying those who helped me get this far..."
"...More than anything else, I would hate myself for it. So I will persevere."
"Hmm... Adults sure have to deal with a lot of complicated things. I'm glad I'm still a kid!"
"Hehe. I still feel as though I am a child as well."
"Then let's play! Let's play more and more! Let's play a whole lot!"
"Yes, of course."
